name: Leap Lurg Leap
description:
Leap! Lurg! Leap! is a game about Lurg, a blue collar lizard who works at a mine. One day the mine experiences an out of control collapse and the whole place begins to fill with lava! Lurg has no choice but to use his company-issued jump suit to try to escape!

Game was not fully completed before submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020. Development is ongoing and it will be updated when complete.
